synopsis.text:
Facing a tumultuous 22nd century where small-scale wars have replaced global conflicts, humanity finds solace in the form of a colossal guardian, Dancougar Nova. This enigmatic robot, hailed by some as a divine entity, stands as a beacon of hope amidst the chaos, shielding the vulnerable from harm. Yet, the true origins and purpose of Dancougar Nova remain shrouded in mystery, leaving even its pilots clueless.

When a formidable adversary emerges in the form of another robot, the Earth is thrust into an unprecedented crisis. With the stakes higher than ever, Dancougar Nova unveils its hidden might, sparking a fierce confrontation that could determine the fate of the world.

At the helm of Dancougar Nova are four unlikely heroes: a racer, a narcotics inspector, a salaryman, and a homeless individual. As they navigate the treacherous battlefield, they must not only endure relentless combat but also unravel the truth behind their powerful mecha and the clandestine organization that employs them. Will they succeed in unearthing the secrets of Dancougar Nova and thwart the looming threat to Earth? The stage is set for an explosive showdown that could alter the course of history.
